name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YOL web3 messenger in Opensea NFT marketplace

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your OpenSea experience by chatting with NFT owners. Send DM to the wallet owner. Enjoy a group chat for each NFT Collection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your OpenSea experience by chatting with NFT owners.
 
Features:
- Send DM to the wallet owner.
- Enjoy a group chat lounge for each NFT Collection.
 
YOL is web3 messenger.
https://yol.chat 
 
Features
- Crypto WalletConnect
- User profile showing off NFTs
- DM to a wallet owner
- Owner's lounge for each NFT collection
 
YOL currently supports Ethereum, Klaytn and is working to support more blockchains and SBT in the future.
